title: Baby Carrier
description: applique and embroidered scrolls and flowers; red, green, blue, white on black; red silk embroidered band on top; blue on two sides; black border on top and sides; top has small dirty white square with blue twill tape; black lining
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
